AddInfo:
This is the first of two booklets in a series by Ajahn Brahmali.
 Part 2 is: [Dependent Liberation](../dlbl)

ignorance/delusion (*avijjā*) ›
willed acts/activities (*saṅkhāra*) ›
consciousness (*viññāṇa*) ›
name and form (*nāmarūpa*) ›
the six senses (*saḷāyatana*) ›
contact/sense impressions (*phassa*) ›
sensations/feelings (*vedanā*) ›
desire/craving (*taṇhā*) ›
taking up (*upādāna*) ›
life/existence (*bhava*) ›
rebirth (*jāti*) ›
old age and death (*jarāmaraṇa*)
